channel.title: [PI]Pk Points[PI]
channel.description: How do I add pk points to my PI source? Just 1 point per kill? My idea was making a leaderboard on who has the most pk points; Best Pkers.

item.title: [PI]Pk Points[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“velosofy, post:4, topic:356189”]I have pk points but how do i make a leaderboard ranking system out of it ?[/quote]lol
change ur title then.

item.title: [PI]Pk Points[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:2, topic:356189”]Well you need a token first. Call it “pkPoints”
Then add this somewhere:

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 1500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated " + playerName + "."); killerz.pkPoints += 1; updateRequired = true; followingh = false; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Its pretty much ALL self-explanatory.[/quote]
Or add

killerz.pkPoints += 1;

in my kill method? But I need a boolean for pk points O_o

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Pk Points[PI]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Well you need a token first. Call it “pkPoints”
Then add this somewhere:

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 1500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated " + playerName + "."); killerz.pkPoints += 1; updateRequired = true; followingh = false; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Its pretty much ALL self-explanatory.

Read full topic
